pandoc 
  to: html
  output-file: index.html
  standalone: true
  toc: true
  number-sections: false
  title-prefix: Bibliometrics and Scholarly Communication
  section-divs: true
  html-math-method: mathjax
  wrap: none
  default-image-extension: png
  
metadata
  crossref:
    chapters: true
  document-css: false
  link-citations: true
  date-format: long
  lang: en
  bibliography:
    - references.bib
  theme: cosmo
  title: Bibliometrics and Scholarly Communication
  author: Philippe Mongeon
  date: '2022-08-28'
